title: LEGO | Disney Stitch Toy - Play & Display Figure with an Ice-Cream Cone & Decorative Flower - Gift for 9+ Year Old Girls, Boys & Lilo & Stitch Movie fans - Holiday Treat - 43249

all_images.alt: LEGO | Disney Stitch Toy - Play & Display Figure with an Ice-Cream Cone & Decorative Flower - Gift for 9+ Year Old Girls, Boys & Lilo & Stitch Movie fans - Holiday Treat - 43249

raw_desc: DISNEY'S LILO AND STITCH – Buildable LEGO ǀ Disney Stitch toy for 9+ year old girls and boys that sparks fans' imaginations PLAY AND DISPLAY DISNEY FIGURE – This LEGO set features a displayable model from Lilo and Stitch, a buildable ice-cream cone and a decorative flower MOVING PARTS – The Disney Stitch figure includes ears that can move up or down, a turning head, and a hand that can hold the ice-cream cone FUN DISPLAY MODEL – Create Stitch in his Hawaiian shirt, move his head and ears into different positions to show new expressions, then display him DISNEY GIFT FOR KIDS – This LEGO | Disney building toy makes a fun Holiday gift for 9+ year old girls, boys and adult Lilo and Stitch movie fans
